title: Kitsune Beekeeper

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to redirect a player to a random player of your choice.
- Use 2 bees to deal three Basic attacks to a player.
- Use 3 bees to make each Fox's vote secretly count as three tomorrow.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: You will earn 1 bee every night. You can use 2 abilities per night.

desc:
Post 3106
*A nine-tailed bzzzz's appearance is an omen, good or bad.*
